entry.title: 2016-10-10 18:00 Mobile Monday Split - Unity Multiplayer
entry.content: <style>*{white-space:pre;}</style>It is time for Mobile Monday #34! After short break, Petar Kekez from IT Sistemi - Nove Tehnologije will introduce us with Unity Multiplayer. After the presentation, as usual, is networking, the relaxing atmosphere with exchange of ideas and experiences.

entry.title: 2016-10-15 18:30 OpenCoffee Split October Meetup
entry.content: <style>*{white-space:pre;}</style>Open Coffee Split je grupa neformalnog karaktera nastala s ciljem okupljanja ljudi slicnih interesa vezanih uz IT industriju.

entry.title: 2016-10-17 09:00 EFW Free co-working week
entry.content:
<style>*{white-space:pre;}</style>Wellcome to Amosfera and work from our coworking space for free throughout the whole of European Freelancer's Week.
#EFW16 http://freelancersweek.org/

entry.title: 2016-10-17 19:00 EFW How I became a successful freelancer
entry.content:
<style>*{white-space:pre;}</style>Originally from Jamaica, but now living in Split, 3D artist and designer Shawn Mitford, CEO of Mitviz, will tell us the story of his life and how his freelancing has taken him around the world, allowed him to work with some of the most well-known companies and on many interesting projects.
#EFW16 http://freelancersweek.org/

entry.title: 2016-10-18 19:00 EFW Freelancer Meetup
entry.content:
<style>*{white-space:pre;}</style>Are you a freelancer? Do you want to be a freelancer? Do you need a freelancer to work on a project? Come to our freelancer meetup where you can network with other freelancers, find out their tricks of the trade, work with one another and see what other opportunities are out there.
#EFW16 http://freelancersweek.org/

entry.title: 2016-10-19 12:00 Internetom do gostiju
entry.content: <style>*{white-space:pre;}</style>1. Turistička web stranica Turistička zajednica Splitsko-dalmatinske županije organizira u suradnji s agencijom AdProfis ciklus edukacija s ciljem povećanja prodaje turističkih proizvoda uz pomoć Internet marketinga. Edukacije, koje će se održavati u hotelu Park, su namijenjene turističkim agencijama i malim hotelijerima, a sudjelovanje je besplatno.
